newFeatures.name: All New File Navigation Bar
newFeatures.description: Quick file navigation with forward, back, locate and search buttons.

newFeatures.name: Enhansed Live Preview
newFeatures.description: Drag any number in code with ctrl+alt or cmd+alt pressed to see instant live preview updates.

newFeatures.name: Open GitHub and GitLab URLs
newFeatures.description: Quick Open (ctrl-shift-o in windows or cmd-shift-o in Mac) and paste a GitHub/GitLab file url to open in Brackets.

newFeatures.name: File type association with external editors support
newFeatures.description: Brackets now supports associating unsupported file types with external editors. You can now open associated file types directly in external applications by double clicking over the files in File Tree.
